query.q: M::`oracle_system`:(AVG(`buffer_cachehit_ratio`) AS `缓冲区缓存命中率`) { `host` = '#{hostname}' and `oracle_service` = '#{service_name}' }
M::`oracle_system`:(fill(AVG(`temp_space_used`), linear) AS `临时空间大小`) { `host` = '#{hostname}' and `oracle_service` = '#{service_name}' }
M::`oracle_tablespace`:(AVG(`in_use`) AS `百分比占用`) { `host` = '#{hostname}' and `oracle_service` = '#{service_name}' } BY `tablespace_name`
M::`oracle_tablespace`:(AVG(`off_use`) AS `挂载状态`) { `host` = '#{hostname}' and `oracle_service` = '#{service_name}' } BY `tablespace_name`
